CustomField.formula: IF( Inter_Contract_Spend_To_Date__c < (0.8 * Effective_Contract_Value__c ), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png", "green"), IF( Inter_Contract_Spend_To_Date__c > (0.9 * Effective_Contract_Value__c ), IMAGE("/img//msg_icons/error16.png", "red"), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/warning16.png", "yellow") ))
CustomField.label: Spend Value Status
